text.author: Wikinews
text.title: Wikinews interviews Israeli mathematician and writer Aner Shalev
text.summary: In an interview, mathematician and writer Aner Shalev tells Wikinews about the origins of his love for mathematics, how analyzing his own dreams got him into creative writing, and two of his books, a collection of stories called Opus 1, and a novel called Dark Matters.
